definition: to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip
classifier for gifts, newspaper, magazine, papers, reports, contracts etc/variant of 分[fen4]

sentences.english: How do I restore a backup created with CPanel?
sentences.chinese: 我要如何使用控制台还原备份？

sentences.english: It also inherits open source tooling for management and backup.
sentences.chinese: 它还继承了用于管理和备份的开放源码工具。

sentences.english: All these records can add up to a nice stack of paper.
sentences.chinese: 所有的这些备份文件积攒起来便成了厚厚一堆纸。

sentences.english: You should also take notes on your current configuration and prepare a backup of your data.
sentences.chinese: 您也应该记录当前的配置并进行数据备份。

sentences.english: You should test the database backup before proceeding.
sentences.chinese: 在继续之前应该测试数据库备份。
从备份中恢复所有数据文件。

sentences.english: Mail was starting to back up, and response times on the clients were starting to elongate.
sentences.chinese: 邮件开始备份，客户机上的响应时间开始加长。

sentences.english: Acquire for this need additional backup disk drive, in case the discharge outside data.
sentences.chinese: 为此需要添置额外备份磁碟机，以防数据外泄。

sentences.english: Got a backup CD that’s too scratched up to read very well?
sentences.chinese: 备份光盘太满而不能读来吗？

sentences.english: This weekend, my project of choice is backups.
sentences.chinese: 这个周末，我的计划是电脑备份。

sentences.english: This offloads the overhead of taking a backup on the production database.
sentences.chinese: 这样就减少了在生产数据库上做备份的开销。

sentences.english: Restore the database using the backup copy.
sentences.chinese: 使用备份副本恢复数据库。

sentences.english: Once the data backup is completed, the data can be exported.
sentences.chinese: 完成数据备份之后，可以导出数据。

sentences.english: The backup utility compresses the data before hitting the disk, in the buffer.
sentences.chinese: 备份实用程序在到达磁盘之前在缓冲区中压缩数据。

sentences.english: The key cannot be changed for the backed-up objects.
sentences.chinese: 已备份对象的密钥不可更改。

sentences.english: Of course, you can always run your own backups to be sure.
sentences.chinese: 当然，您可以经常进行备份以确保万无一失。

definition: to file/to save a file (computer)/saved data (for a video game etc)
to file away/to place on file
